overview: Patrick Collins proudly presents, It's a Secretary Thing 2, a collection of stunning superstars dressed up as seductive secretaries. Watch the sublime Kristina Rose, alongside Jenna Haze, Celeste Star, Evie Delatosso, Charlotte Vale, Roxanne Hall, and Jana Jordan. It's a Secretary Thing 2 is a depiction of fantasy role-playing at its best. In an industry that is over saturated with unoriginal couch sex, Patrick Collins focuses on creative scenarios, chemistry between performers and real female orgasms. His movies are unlike anything else in porn.
tagline: A collection of stunning superstars dressed up as seductive secretaries
title: It's a Secretary Thing! 2
